law.catch_line: The Senate Chairman and the House Chairman of the Committee shall be appointed by the President and ...
law.text: The Senate Chairman and the House Chairman of the Committee shall be appointed by the President and the Speaker, respectively, from the membership of the Committee. One shall be a Senator appointed by the President, and the other shall be a Delegate appointed by the Speaker. The presiding chairmanship and cochairmanship shall be alternated annually between the Senate and the House.
